reviews.review_content:
There's no bones about it, L&R;  sucks, but it isn't as bad as it could  be, with Rob WIlliams. He is a really  nice guy and has taught the course  before. He's always prepared for  class. Hard and fair grader. 
Workload:
500 words per class, progressively  longer. In class essay for midterm  and final
